subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are trying to figure out how to harness the mysterious forces that led Jamal Crawford to make 16 straight shots on his way to scoring 52 points Friday night in a victory against the Miami Heat.
snippet: The Knicks are trying to figure out how to harness the mysterious forces that led Jamal Crawford to make 16 straight shots on his way to scoring 52 points Friday night in a victory against the Miami Heat.
